attributes.review: Donald J Trump punted my baby off my balcony like a football when I downloaded this app!! My dear first born son, Jacobvi, is now suffering and is a vegetable. 🥺 I just wanted to support my favorite president but no, my only son is now paralyzed. RIP Jacobvi 2020 you will forever be missed.
attributes.title: Terrible app

attributes.review: This app is horrendous it takes too long to load, the app is glitchy and their spreading false information on it!!! Also this stupid Cheeto looking incel it trying to take away TikTok
attributes.title: Makes me want to die

attributes.review: I started to support Donald Trump but this app is not it. Its so awful it takes too long to process things, some so simple takes up so much of my time, don’t get this app, its not worth it!!!
attributes.title: Doesn’t make sense

attributes.review: not good. i wanted to support my president but upon opening the app i was met with many glitches and disturbing photos of a very orange man. i quickly deleted the app and suggest many others do the same.
attributes.title: Spam

attributes.review: this app took 4 HOURS TO DOWNLOAD. Anyways, the app is super slow and as i was going through the app seeing what his plans were for the election IT CRASHES. The app continued to crash over 4 WHOLE times. such a waste of time.
attributes.title: so slow

attributes.review: I downloaded this app to see trumps plans for this year and it made my phone trash. I had to delete it because it made my phone really slow and the app was unhelpful. I deleted it.
attributes.title: This app is so bad.

attributes.review: The app kept crashing and glitching, very disappointing. I also don’t agree with trump when it comes to politics but besides that I believe the app is run very  poorly
attributes.title: Just throw the whole app away

attributes.review: I wanted to know what was going on with our “amazing president” but I get getting notifications in the middle of the night when i was trying to go sleep. I do not recommend if you want peaceful sleeping.
attributes.title: HORRIBLE
